text:
I install the apache 1_3_4 and he run, but the apache 2 series show in the log 
file error.log (OS 10038) talk about socket error invalid conect. Why this and 
how fix the bug ?
creator: jose.nogueiraneto@ac.gov.br

text:
I search for any site about the bug and find the microsoft page speak about 
winsock error OS 10038 but not anything about fix error on the apache run
creator: jose.nogueiraneto@ac.gov.br
nd@perlig.de
text: Do you have some firewall software running?

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
Hmm, no real idea at the moment.
Do you have a virus scanner installed?
Do you have the latest Service Pack for XP?

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
For the records:
After PM exchange we found out, that a virus scanner caused the problem.
Uninstalling the scanner and rebooting the computer solved the problem.
